keywords: ['complex synth arpeggio melodies', 'sensual high pitched female vocal', 'atmospheric pad synth', 'electronic dance music', 'mellow', 'energy building']
caption: Whilst this clip is mellow, it feels like the song has a general sense of budding energy. On the bass guitar we have a simple three note motif repeated across different chords. The singer has a seductive, airy and sultry female voice. In the background, we hear an atmospheric, futuristic pad synth.
